note:
Discordian, subgenius, Tarvuist, Shatnerologist. I oscillate at high frequency between taking nothing seriously and taking everything WAY too seriously. Generally fighting depression and/or anxiety. Extreme social anxiety... I am struggling just to write this blurb, thinking someone *might* read it. So: sorry for the lack of an introduction post, I prefer to just lurk. I try to post, but 80-90% of the time after composing I just click away instead.

I have the occasional opinion.

fields.name: Professional
fields.value: IT guy managing a painfully undersized department

fields.name: Personal
fields.value: I find joy in birds, squirrels, games, my small family

fields.name: If I follow you
fields.value: It's because I'm interested in what you post.  I'm not at all concerned with being followed back.
